item.title: Implementing ML algorithms from scratch
item.description: To further improve upon my knowledge on ML algorithms, I’m trying to implement popular algorithms from scratch only using NumPy. Even though the world is moving towards LLMs, Rags and Langchain I belive that having a strong foundation would really help in understanding these advanced algorithms better. You can find my progress in this repository and I’d welcome any feedback!
